Title: US Treasury expands sanctions on Russia’s LNG industry
Description: The US Treasury Department has introduced more sanctions on the country’s LNG sector, including on the Chinese shipyard supplying modules for the Artic LNG 2 project and three operators of proposed LNG projects.
Author: JS

Title: ADNOC takes FID on Ruwais LNG, awards EPC contract
Description: UAE’s state-owned ADNOC has made a final investment decision on the 9.6 mtpa Ruwais LNG project in Al Ruwais and awarded an EPC contract worth $5.5 billion to build the project.
Author: JS

Title: Uniper ends Russian gas supply deals, severing long-term supply relationship with Gazprom
Description: Germany’s state-owned utility Uniper has decided to terminate its non-performing Russian gas supply contracts, severing a long-term relationship with Russia’s state-owned Gazprom Export.
Author: CK

Title: Australian LNG exports dip in May, pulled lower by Gorgon’s single-train outage
Description: Australia shipped less LNG in May as a five-week-long single-train outage at the three-train Gorgon LNG plant in Western Australia capped the month’s exports.
Author: CK
